content.text:
# Kara, Republic of Dagestan

}}
Kara (; ) is a rural locality (or selo) in Laksky District, Republic of Dagestan, Russia.
In 2010, the population was 529. There are 9 streets.
Geography
Kara is located  northeast of the district's administrative centre Kumukh by road. Kundy and Kuma are the nearest rural localities.
